item.title: ‘The Thursday Murder Club’ Review: Helen Mirren and Pierce Brosnan Bring Star Power to Netflix’s Conventional Old-Folks Mystery
item.description: Chris Columbus’ film also features Ben Kingsley, Jonathan Pryce, Naomi Ackie and Celia Imrie in key supporting roles.
